Text.Name: 08_ScientificApplications\Spectroscopy\SpectralPreprocessing\Smoothing
Text.SourceText:
##### Calibration
The calibration step will change the spectrum's x-axis. Presumed that a calibration was made (see [here](#Section_RamanSpectroscopy_CalibrationWithNeonAndSi)), the x-axis can be changed from an uncalibrated x-axis to a calibrated x-axis.
